en.title: When did you first find out about the adultery?
en.whenAdulteryFound: If you're not sure, use the closest date you remember.

errors.requireFirstFoundDate: Enter a date between the day you got married and the day you submitted your divorce application.

adulteryFirstFoundDate.question: Enter the date that you first found out about the adultery
adulteryFirstFoundDate.allRequired: Enter a date between the day you got married and the day you submitted your divorce application.
adulteryFirstFoundDate.dayRequired: Enter a valid day that you first found out about the adultery
adulteryFirstFoundDate.monthRequired: Enter a valid month that you first found out about the adultery
adulteryFirstFoundDate.yearRequired: Enter a valid year that you first found out about the adultery
